long_description: The Blackburn Click Combo light set offers easy-to-use front and rear lighting to improve your visibility to motorists as you ride. White front and red rear lights use 2 super-bright LEDs, which offer excellent battery life and are nearly indestructible; front light boasts a 15 lumen output. Easy-to-use design lets you turn the lights on or off by simply pressing the lens. Mount the lights to your handlebar or seat post without need of tools; the integrated silicon straps adjust easily. Lights run for 70 hours on constant and 140 hours on flash mode. The Blackburn Click Combo light set operates on 2 CR2032 batteries (included).
short_description: The Blackburn Click Combo light set offers easy-to-use front and rear lighting to improve your visibility to motorists as you ride.
